title: Bugsplat after Champ Select.
body: First crashed during a custom game with a friend. Got through champ select just fine and was played for a about ten minutes before it bugsplat. After that I wasn't able to play the game without crashing after champ select. Didn't matter what game mode i tried to play. Normals or customs.

replies.body:
Seeing a Bug Splat screen (where you're able to send an error report) typically means some sort of driver or other hardware issue is going on. Take a look over our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to narrow down the source of the crash.

If you have any other problems just let me know ^_^!
